title: whatever happened to the mixed use development that was planned near the cape fear memorial bridge?
text:
Like many -- if not most -- development projects across the area,
state and even country, this one has been delayed with the economic
slowdown. In the next month or so, the StarNews will be launching a
site that plans to showcase all development projects across the area
and updates on their status or date of completion. Look for it coming
soon to StarNewsOnline.com, and thanks for using MyReporter.com
